transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji Pradhan sir Hemant baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji Hemant bhai bataiye.
Executive: Haan, main woh keh raha tha sir woh bilkul bhi blur aa raha tha kya jo maine bheja tha aapko jo aapko.
Customer: Haan woh jo aapne screenshot are woh photo khich ke bheja tha na.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh
Executive: Woh padhne mein nahi aa raha tha, do bheja hai, ek toh padha ja sakta hai, ek jo aur bheja hai woh.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main dekhta hu agar mujhe milta hai, main dekhta hu mail pe agar aaya hua solution ki team ne kya resolve karke diya tha, ki aap usko apne daal dijiyega apne complaint mein ki bhai IndiaMART se mujhe solution mil gaya tha mera ticket close ho gaya hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Toh padhne mein aayega tabhi toh.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai Pradhan sir ek cheez aur puch raha tha ki sir please jab aap isko buylead vagera toh consume karo sir, theek hai aap abhi chal raha hai problem hai, please buylead consume karte rahiye ki jab solution mil jayega.
Executive: Buylead ke siwa hello hello dimag pakane ke liye aur kya kare.
Executive: Samajh raha hu main sari baat aapki samajh raha hu sir.
Customer: Woh customer se hum final baat toh kar nahi sakte.
Customer: Aur bas hello haan hai nahi hai yeh photo bhejo, photo bhejo itna hi hona hai usse koi matlab hai nahi.
Executive: Theek hai ek kaam toh karo sir Pradhan sir ek do baar se baat karke dekho agar maan lo woh maan jaate hai aapke account mein paise daalne ke liye kisi mein toh chalo achi baat hai na sir kuch agar nahi toh mana karenge toh koi baat nahi.
Customer: Hum logo ka hum logo ka private limited firm hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Toh abhi yaha se koi maal bina GST ke nikal nahi sakta.
Executive: Woh samajh gaya sir private limited firm hai woh koi bhi bina GST ke nahi jayegi main agree kar raha hu.
Customer: Niklegi nahi ab uske liye GST GST sare papers banane hai jaise hi woh 50000 se upar ki koi bill aa jayegi toh woh e-way bill banta hai.
Customer: Unko technical mamla kayi hai.
Customer: Achha khaamkha ke liye abhi toh hamara account seize hua hai phir kal koi maal hum phir saving account mein deke aur koi mukadma jhel le.
Customer: Samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Customer: Baat samajh rahe hai.
Executive: Pradhan sir kya hua na ki kal aapne mujhe phone kiya ek do baar apne phone kiya toh main busy tha utha nahi paya toh aapke incoming call aap karte ho toh main utha nahi pa raha hu mujhe concern lag raha tha ki bhai aapka phone aaya aur maine uthaya nahi.
Customer: Na na woh toh aapki kareeb ke hai isliye aap usko personal dekh rahe hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Toh woh achha hai bahaal dekhiye isme jo sahayata ho sakti hai kariye kyunki bina GST ke koi maal hum jab nikalenge.
Executive: Toh kal hamare liye bhi aur dikkat ho sakti hai maan lo koi fas gaya mamla.
Customer: Samajh gaya samajh gaya dusra account mein bhi fas jayega toh har account mein.
Customer: Haan yeh sab kahani hai bhai.
Customer: Yeh chhote chhote dukandar jo hote hai chhote chhote dukandar hai yeh yeh toh kuch bhi kar lete hai hum log nahi kar payenge na.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir samajh gaya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai Pradhan sir baki main ek cheez aur keh raha tha sir jaise abhi maine aapko bataya ki aapne kal mujhe ek do baar phone kiya incoming call aapki aayi toh main busy tha dobara maine aapse baat hui toh.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Isi ko dekh lijiye woh woh jo thank you call kar paya toh close karunga toh mere liye cheez sahi jayega tha theek hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi aap usko dekh le woh jo screenshot mil jaye thoda.
Executive: Haan aap dekh lijiye.
Executive: Ke jo solution hamare.
Customer: Ek usme do aapne bheja ek toh padha ja sakta hai.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ek padha ja pa raha hai aur ek toh padha nahi ja raha hai toh jo nahi padha ja raha hai usi ko.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main mail wale ko dekh leta hu aapke mail agar woh main dekh leta hu agar aapke mail pe bhi jaata hoga na toh main aapko bata dunga kya sir woh aapke mail pe bhi gaya hoga.
Customer: Haan mail pe bhi aaye toh bhi chalega dekh lenge hum mail pe agar aaya hai toh bhi aa jayega dekh lenge.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai sir baki yeh sab main ticket close kar raha hu please feedback de dijiyega apna theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received blurred images.

- Wants to consume buyleads.

- Cannot talk to customers.

- Concerned about GST issues.



Resolution:

- Executive will check for a clearer image.

- Advised to consume buyleads.

- Executive understood the customer's concern.

- Executive will provide assistance.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, account, solution, blurred images
